titles.title: American Merchant Marine Memorial Wall of Honor Expansion Act of 1999
To authorize the Secretary of Transportation to make grants for the construction of an addition to the American Merchant Marine Memorial Wall of Honor located in San Pedro, California.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Coast Guard and Maritime Transportation.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

bill.summary: 5/19/1999--Introduced. American Merchant Marine Memorial Wall of Honor Expansion Act of 1999 - Authorizes the Secretary of Transportation to make grants to the American Merchant Marine Veterans Memorial Committee, Inc., to construct an addition to the American Merchant Marine Memorial Wall of Honor located at the Los Angeles Maritime Museum in San Pedro, California. Limits the Federal share of the cost of activities carried out with such grants to 50 percent. Authorizes appropriations.
